attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reason there are so many dole scroungers in this country is because there is a wealth of trashy daytime television that people can sit and vegetate over - from Jeremy Kyle in the morning through to Ready, Steady, Cook in the evening.

If the Government banned this stuff or replaced it with educational and informative television then a large proportion of idle wasters would have no reason to stay in and go out and get a job.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
